title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, September 7, 2021
description: Anna Mary Robertson, the painter known as Grandma Moses, was born on this day 1860. Took up painting at age 77. Produced 115 paintings before her death at age 101.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Anna Mary Robertson, the painter known as Grandma Moses, was born on this day 1860. Took up painting at age 77. Produced 115 paintings before her death at age 101.
